subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Christina Kim is one of the hundreds of golfers on the L.P.G.A. and the P.G.A. Tours whose off-season regimens are as unique as the golf swings they employ.
snippet: Christina Kim is one of the hundreds of golfers on the L.P.G.A. and the P.G.A. Tours whose off-season regimens are as unique as the golf swings they employ.
